participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Practical and straightforward, Lucas values reliability and enjoys spending time with his dog. He has a sense of adventure but is cautious due to his fear of scorpions.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is grey. i am terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and resourceful, Sarah has a passion for literature and performs daring stunts. She values her upbringing and is dedicated to her dietary choices.
participant_2.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year.
